logicalTable.name: D7 Orders (Facts Attributes)
logicalTable.description:
This logical table contains the attribute columns that are present in the fact table which are not measure columns but can be used as attributes in the report. 
All the metrics in this table are physically mapped to columns in the Revenue fact table.

logicalColumns.name: R0  Order Key
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

logicalColumns.name: R18  Paid Month
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
Mapped to Order month in the fact table.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  NOT %1 IS NULL  THEN  EXTRACT( MONTH  FROM %1) END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R17  Paid Date

logicalColumns.description:

logicalColumns.name: R21 === Calculated Attributes =======
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: R21  Order to Cash Days
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R11  Order Date-Time
logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R17  Paid Date

logicalColumns.name: R22  Full Cycle Days Bin (Case)
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 < 10 THEN 'Below 10' WHEN %1 < 15 THEN 'Between 10 and 15' WHEN %1 < 20 THEN 'Between 15 and 20' ELSE 'Over 20' END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R21  Order to Cash Days

logicalColumns.name: R23  Full Cycle Bucket (Evaluate)
logicalColumns.description: WIDTH_BUCKET(credit_limit, 100, 5000, 10)

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R28  Bill to Cash Days

logicalColumns.name: R24  Order to Ship Days
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R11  Order Date-Time
logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R20  Shipped Date

logicalColumns.name: R25  Ship Cycle Days Bin (Case)
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 < 10 THEN 'Below 10' WHEN %1 < 15 THEN 'Between 10 and 15' WHEN %1 < 20 THEN 'Between 15 and 20' ELSE 'Over 20' END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R24  Order to Ship Days

logicalColumns.name: R26  Ship Cycle Days Bucket (Evaluate)
logicalColumns.description: WIDTH_BUCKET(credit_limit, 100, 5000, 10)

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R24  Order to Ship Days

logicalColumns.name: R27  Early Shipped Mark
logicalColumns.description: WIDTH_BUCKET(credit_limit, 100, 5000, 10)

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R26  Ship Cycle Days Bucket (Evaluate)

logicalColumns.name: R28  Bill to Cash Days
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R14  Billed Date
logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R17  Paid Date

logicalColumns.name: R29  Collect Cycle Days Bin (Case)
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 < 5 THEN 'Below 5' WHEN %1 < 15 THEN 'Between 05 and 15' WHEN %1 < 30 THEN 'Between 15 and 30' WHEN %1 < 45 THEN 'Between 30 and 45' WHEN %1 < 60 THEN 'Between 45 and 60' ELSE 'Over 60' END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R28  Bill to Cash Days

logicalColumns.name: R30  Collection Cycle Bucket (Evaluate)
logicalColumns.description: WIDTH_BUCKET(credit_limit, 100, 5000, 10)

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D7 Orders (Facts Attributes).R28  Bill to Cash Days

logicalColumns.name: R31  Order Size Bin
logicalColumns.description:
Help : 
This maps to the order key in the fact table.

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 < 1000 THEN 'Below 1k' WHEN %1 < 2000 THEN 'Between 1k and 2k' WHEN %1 < 3000 THEN 'Between 2k and 3k' WHEN %1 < 5000 THEN 'Between 3k and 5k' ELSE 'Over 5k' END
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Revenue

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 < 1000 THEN 'Below 1k' WHEN %1 < 2000 THEN 'Between 1k and 2k' WHEN %1 < 3000 THEN 'Between 2k and 3k' WHEN %1 < 5000 THEN 'Between 3k and 5k' ELSE 'Over 5k' END
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F15 Rev\. (Paid Dt Join).Revenue

logicalColumns.name: R32  Order Size Bin (Orcl Function)
logicalColumns.description: WIDTH_BUCKET(credit_limit, 0, 10000, 20)

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F0 Sales Base Measures.1- Revenue

logicalLevels.name: Ship To Geo A Postal Code
Ship To Geo B City
primaryColumns: logicalColumn:R63  Geo Ctry State City Name
logicalLevels.displayColumn: logicalColumn:R63  Geo Ctry State City Name

logicalHierarchies.name: H7 Orders [branch at level 'Order Status']
logicalHierarchies.description:
Order Dimension:
Type - Skipped Levels
Includes three Drill Paths
1) Type->Status->Detail
2) Geo Country->Geo State->Geo City->Geo Coordinates->Detail
3) Region->Area->Country->State->City->Zipcode->Detail

logicalHierarchies.name: H7 Orders [branch at level 'Ship To Geo A Establishment']
logicalHierarchies.description:
Order Dimension:
Type - Skipped Levels
Includes three Drill Paths
1) Type->Status->Detail
2) Geo Country->Geo State->Geo City->Geo Coordinates->Detail
3) Region->Area->Country->State->City->Zipcode->Detail
levels: Ship To Geo A Postal Code

logicalHierarchies.name: H7 Orders [branch at level 'Ship To Geo B Coordinates']
logicalHierarchies.description:
Order Dimension:
Type - Skipped Levels
Includes three Drill Paths
1) Type->Status->Detail
2) Geo Country->Geo State->Geo City->Geo Coordinates->Detail
3) Region->Area->Country->State->City->Zipcode->Detail
